entry.name: AstraMilitarum/BacklineHarassmentDescription
entry.value: Disrupt an enemy's combat effectiveness. Temporarily gain Stealth to escape.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/BacklineHarassmentFlavor
entry.value: Drookians have mastered the art of nighttime raids, balancing frequency to maximize both self-preservation and psychological damage upon the enemy.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/WaylayDescription
entry.value: Slow down an enemy and steal their resources. Greatly demoralizes the enemy.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/WaylayFlavor
entry.value: Spending days observing the enemy's movements and habits lends itself quite well to finding gaps in patrols. A few dead guards later, and the camp supplies find their way into Drookian rucksacks, with booby-trapped weapons scattered about.

entry.name: ThrowSmokeGrenadeDescription
entry.value: Throws a smoke grenade, leaving a cloud that lasts for 2 turns.
